job.title: Development Lead
brief: My contract with Atos involved development of a flagship quotation solution for Vanco Plc. The project was based on the .Net 2.0 framework. I handled solution design & configuration management in cooperation with the Technical Architect. My role included ensuring the use of best practice solutions across the functional requirements. I incorporated the Microsoft Enterprise Library data, transaction, logging & exception libraries using ADO.Net & an entities based DAL. I also introduced the team to Continuous Integration utilising automated, source control based builds using CruiseControl.Net & MS Build. I was responsible to educate developers & stakeholders on Agile principles & to advocate the use of Agile methodologies & Test Driven Development within the business.
